author: Taylor Hurt
description: Find out more about Taylor's developer profile, career objectives, and recent projects.
title: Taylor Hurt's Developer Profile

contents.p: This is a brief presentation about Taylor's background and recent projects.

ul: STEM graduate from a Big-10 university
2 yrs. experience in HTML, CSS, Javascript
2 yrs. experience serving clients in a technical support role
Experience making nodejs utilities and build tools
Experience provisioning and managing remote servers
Domain knowledge in Biology, Genetics, Agriculture
MVC, MVVM, PubSub, Functional Programming, Test-Driven Development, Mocha/Chai
express.js, Handlebars, Joi, RAML, Swagger, nginx, MySQL, ArangoDB, RethinkDB
Semantic HTML, Bootstrap, Responsive Design, Photoshop
git, remote ssh/scp/sftp, SSL Certs, bash scripting, cron, regexs, lxc virtual containers

contents.p: Many functions in the Ramda library are hard to explain with just words. This project improved the library's documentation with the creation of an input/output notation similar to Mathematica.
Tags: Functional Programming, Documentation, Handlebars, Open-Source Development

The existing Ramda REPL suffered from an inflexible layout, making it unusable for users with smaller screen sizes. This project increased screen real estate and used Bootstrap to enable automatic layout adjustments at smaller screen sizes.
Try the REPL⇗
Tags: Responsive Design, Bootstrap, Open-Source Development
A custom UX/UI was created and integrated with the graph library Springy to create this fluid and interactive application.
Try the demo⇗
Tags: UX/UI Design, Graphs, Canvas, Library Integration
This project uses a JSON schema as the foundational data for automated form creation and user input type checking. The MVC architecture is followed in the code.
Try the demo⇗
Tags: Schemas, Forms, MVC
This practical application exemplifies MVVM and PubSub architecture. The Note model provides a Data Access Layer to localStorage and the View Models contain the logic to perform DOM updates.
Try the demo⇗
Tags: MVVM, PubSub, Bootstrap, UX Design, localStorage
This weekend project attempted to recreate the classic Snakes game. The game board is responsive to window size so try adjusting it and then refresh to play at different sizes.
Try the demo⇗
Tags: Canvas, Game, AI
This small demo is the result of implementing component-style classes with a single data state. It allows users to dynamically create new components and create macros for component functions.
Try the demo⇗
Tags: Components, Single Data Structure State, Virtual DOM, Immutability
This wireframe was created in Photoshop and then turned into a functional website with HTML and CSS.
Click the image to see full-screen.
Tags: Wireframe, Photoshop, Custom Graphics
